program: Master of Business Administration (MBA) – Tuck School of Business

sections.text: The Tuck MBA is designed to develop wise, decisive leaders who better the world of business through teamwork, rigorous analysis, and a global mindset.

items: First-year core in strategy, accounting, economics, analytics, and leadership
Second-year electives across management, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship
sections.text: The two-year curriculum combines a comprehensive management core with experiential projects and global learning opportunities.

items: At least 2 years of professional work experience (average ~5 years)
sections.text: Applicants should demonstrate strong professional and academic preparation, with significant work experience.
Graduates pursue leadership roles in consulting, finance, technology, healthcare, and social enterprise.
